mapper.insert: insert into class_info (id, name, creat_time, modify_time, is_deleted) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted,jdbcType=TINYINT})

insert into class_info
id,
name,
creat_time,
modify_time,
is_deleted,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{creatTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{deleted,jdbcType=TINYINT},
mapper.update:
update class_info
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
